name: Hypnogogia (Demo, in development)
description:
DISCLAIMER: This is just a demo. It still doesn't have any ending. Right now it's only a very sad sandbox.

Hypnogogia is a simulation game with "multiple endings" in which you play and replay the same day over and over in the "regular life" of Rafa: an exploited 3rd world doctor.

It's like Surgeon Simulator meeting Night in the Woods in 2D graphics and a 3rd world setting.

But no matter how hard you try to sabotage Rafa, everything gets magically fixed by the end of the day.
